item.title: Digital Garden
item.description: I write to think, to learn, to manage my time, and to solve problems. Some years ago I started following some of the practices proposed in the book How to take smart notes and now I mainly take the following kind of notes:

item.title: Learning
item.description: I love learning. This is a door to what I am currently learning. Lately I have been using Reader by Readwise quite a lot.

item.title: Now
item.description: Currently I am focused on: Devoting time to my wife and daughter. Learning about management and Complex Problem Solving. Sharing publicly my thoughts and learning path in the Data Science field.

item.title: Pelayo Arbués
item.description: Hi folks! I’m Pelayo Arbués, currently based in Gijón and Madrid, Spain, and I’m the Head of Data Science at idealista, the leading real estate online marketplace in Southern Europe.

item.title: Photography
item.description: Photo by Pelayo Arbués at Unsplash A long time ago I did a lot of sports. I played football, tennis and skateboarded.

item.title: Research
item.description: I worked as an applied economist in the Academia since 2007 until 2014. The spatial productivity of transportation infrastructure
